titleStmt.title: To the Parlament of the Common-Wealth of England, Scotland and Ireland. The humble petition of Thomas Brewer, gentl: and William Pawlin, Elizabeth Quested, widdow, and Ann Beswick, daughter of Ann Beswick, widdow, creditors of Ulick Earl of St. Albans, and Clanricard, on the behalf of themselves, and other the creditors of the said Earl.
titleStmt.author: Brewer, Thomas, gent.

titleStmt.title: To the Parlament of the Common-Wealth of England, Scotland and Ireland. The humble petition of Thomas Brewer, gentl: and William Pawlin, Elizabeth Quested, widdow, and Ann Beswick, daughter of Ann Beswick, widdow, creditors of Ulick Earl of St. Albans, and Clanricard, on the behalf of themselves, and other the creditors of the said Earl.
titleStmt.author: Brewer, Thomas, gent.
Pawlin, William.
Quested, Elizabeth.
Beswick, Ann.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "A petition against John Bradshaw Decemb. 1654".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
